name: ab-testing-platform
description: A/B Testing Platform with Node.js backend and React frontend

scripts.build: npm run build -w @ab-testing/backend && npm run build -w @ab-testing/frontend
scripts.test: npm run test -w @ab-testing/backend && npm run test -w @ab-testing/frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w @ab-testing/backend && npm run lint -w @ab-testing/frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w @ab-testing/backend && npm run lint:fix -w @ab-testing/frontend
